parameters.description: ID of the asset to delete

Retrieve a list of all active assets

200.description: List of maintenance logs within the date range

Get maintenance schedules for an asset

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to look ahead

200.description: List of maintenance schedules within the date range

delete.summary: Remove a comment from a work order
